def longest_common_contiguous_subarray(arr1, arr2):
    len1 = len(arr1)
    len2 = len(arr2)
    max_len = 1
    current_len = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i < len1 and j < len2:
        if arr1[i] == arr2[j]:
            current_len += 1
            if current_len > max_len:
                max_len = current_len
            i += 1
            j += 1
        elif arr1[i] < arr2[j]:
            i += 1
            current_len = 0
        else:
            j += 1
            current_len = 0
    return max_len
